name: Fried Gram
description: Premium quality roasted chana dal (fried gram) with a crispy texture and nutty flavor. Perfect as a healthy snack or ingredient for various dishes.

name: White Chick Peas
description: Premium quality white chickpeas (kabuli chana) sourced from the finest farms. Perfect for making curries, salads, and traditional dishes.

name: Green Peas
description: Fresh dried green peas with natural sweetness and vibrant color. Essential ingredient for various Indian dishes and curries.

name: Badam Pisin
description: Premium almond gum (badam pisin) known for its cooling properties and health benefits. Used in traditional drinks and desserts.

name: Jaggery Powder
description: Pure organic jaggery powder made from sugarcane juice. A healthy alternative to refined sugar with natural minerals and vitamins.

name: Round Red Chilli
description: Premium dried round red chilies with intense heat and rich flavor. Essential for authentic South Indian cooking and spice blends.

name: Jaggery Balls
description: Traditional handmade jaggery balls crafted from pure sugarcane juice. These golden spheres are perfect for making sweets and traditional remedies.

name: Multani Mitti
description: Pure Fuller's earth clay powder known for its excellent skin cleansing and oil-absorbing properties. Perfect for natural face masks and beauty treatments.

name: Red Chilli
description: Premium dried red chilies with perfect balance of heat and flavor. Essential spice for Indian cooking and spice preparations.

name: Nattukaramani (Black-eyed Peas)
description: Traditional black-eyed peas (cowpeas) known for their distinctive appearance and nutritional value. Perfect for making traditional South Indian dishes.

name: White Peas
description: Premium quality dried white peas with creamy texture and mild flavor. Excellent for making curries, soups, and traditional dishes.

name: Puffed Rice
description: Light and crispy puffed rice perfect for making traditional snacks like bhel puri and murmura. A healthy, low-calorie snacking option.

name: Turmeric Powder
description: Premium quality turmeric powder sourced from the finest farms in South India. Known for its vibrant color and rich aroma, our turmeric adds authentic flavor to your dishes.
benefits: Enhances flavor and color in cooking

name: Green Cardamom
description: Aromatic green cardamom pods harvested from the hills of South India. These premium pods add a sweet, floral flavor to both savory dishes and desserts.
benefits: Versatile for sweet and savory dishes

name: Filter Coffee
description: Traditional South Indian filter coffee blend with 80% coffee and 20% chicory. Perfectly roasted to deliver a rich, aromatic cup with every brew.

name: Banana Chips
description: Crispy, golden banana chips made from fresh Nendran bananas. Lightly spiced and fried to perfection in pure coconut oil for an authentic taste.

name: Cinnamon Sticks
description: Premium quality cinnamon sticks with a sweet, woody aroma. Perfect for infusing flavor into teas, desserts, and savory dishes.

name: Black Pepper
description: Premium Malabar black peppercorns known for their robust flavor and aroma. The perfect finishing touch for any dish.

name: Murukku
description: Crunchy, spiral-shaped savory snack made from rice flour and urad dal. Perfectly spiced with cumin and black pepper.

name: Masala Chai
description: Premium tea blend with cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, and other aromatic spices. Creates the perfect cup of authentic Indian chai.

name: Cloves
description: Aromatic flower buds with intense flavor, perfect for both sweet and savory dishes. Our cloves are carefully selected for maximum potency.

name: Fenugreek Seeds
description: Aromatic fenugreek seeds with a slightly bitter taste and maple-like aroma. Essential in many South Indian dishes and pickles.

name: Virgin Coconut Oil
description: Cold-pressed virgin coconut oil with a delicate aroma. Perfect for cooking, hair care, and skin care.

name: Basmati Rice
description: Premium aged basmati rice with long grains and a delicate aroma. Perfect for biryanis and pulao.

name: Toor Dal
description: High-quality split pigeon peas, essential for making sambar and other South Indian lentil dishes.

name: Mixture
description: A savory blend of fried lentils, nuts, and spices. This crunchy snack is perfect for tea time or as an anytime treat.

name: Tender Coconut Water
description: Pure and refreshing tender coconut water, naturally sweet and packed with electrolytes.

name: Nannari Sherbet
description: Traditional South Indian summer drink made from the roots of the Nannari plant. Naturally cooling and refreshing.

name: Green Gram (Mung Beans)
description: Premium whole green mung beans with excellent nutritional value. Perfect for making sprouts, curries, and traditional Indian dishes.

name: Moong Dal
description: Split yellow mung beans (moong dal) known for their light, easily digestible nature. Perfect for making dal, khichdi, and traditional sweets.

name: White Poppy Seeds
description: Premium white poppy seeds (khus khus) with nutty flavor and creamy texture. Essential for thickening gravies and making traditional sweets.

name: Cumin Seeds
description: Aromatic cumin seeds with warm, earthy flavor. Essential spice for tempering and spice blends in Indian cuisine.

name: Black Sesame Seeds
description: Premium black sesame seeds with rich, nutty flavor. Excellent for making traditional sweets, chutneys, and health tonics.

name: Ajwain Seeds (Carom Seeds)
description: Aromatic ajwain seeds with strong, thyme-like flavor. Known for their digestive properties and used in Indian breads and snacks.

name: Masoor Dal (Red Lentils)
description: Premium red lentils (masoor dal) that cook quickly and have a mild, earthy flavor. Perfect for making dal, soups, and protein-rich meals.

name: Star Anise
description: Premium star anise with distinctive eight-pointed star shape and sweet licorice flavor. Essential for garam masala, biryanis, and traditional Chinese five-spice blends.

name: Dry Figs (Anjeer)
description: Premium quality dried figs with natural sweetness and chewy texture. Rich in fiber, potassium, and antioxidants. Perfect for snacking or adding to desserts.

name: Mustard Seeds
description: Small, pungent mustard seeds essential for tempering in South Indian cuisine. Adds a sharp, nutty flavor when heated in oil.

name: Raw Peanuts
description: Fresh, unroasted peanuts with natural skins intact. Perfect for roasting, making peanut butter, or adding to traditional Indian snacks and chutneys.

name: Sabja Seeds (Basil Seeds)
description: Tiny black basil seeds that swell when soaked in water. Known for their cooling properties and used in traditional drinks and desserts.

name: Almonds
description: Premium California almonds with rich, buttery flavor. Excellent source of vitamin E, healthy fats, and protein. Perfect for snacking or cooking.

name: Kishmish (Golden Raisins)
description: Sweet, golden raisins with natural sweetness and chewy texture. Perfect for adding to rice dishes, desserts, and traditional Indian sweets.

name: Wood Screws
description: Premium quality wood screws made from high-grade steel with sharp threads for easy installation. Perfect for woodworking and general construction.

name: Hex Bolts
description: Heavy-duty hexagonal head bolts manufactured from high-tensile steel. Ideal for structural connections and machinery assembly.

name: Concrete Nails
description: Hardened steel nails designed specifically for concrete and masonry applications. Features fluted shank for superior holding power.

name: Door Hinges
description: Heavy-duty door hinges with ball bearings for smooth operation. Made from high-quality brass with a polished finish.

name: Measuring Tape
description: Professional-grade retractable measuring tape with metric and imperial markings. Features a sturdy case and lock mechanism.

name: Wall Anchors
description: Plastic wall anchors designed for secure mounting in drywall, plaster, and hollow walls. Expands when screws are inserted for maximum grip.

name: Plumbing Tape
description: PTFE thread seal tape for plumbing applications. Creates a watertight seal on threaded pipe connections without hardening or cracking.

name: Wire Cutters
description: Professional-grade wire cutters with hardened steel blades and cushioned grip handles. Perfect for electrical work and general cutting tasks.

name: Cabinet Handles
description: Modern stainless steel cabinet handles with a brushed finish. Adds a contemporary touch to kitchen and bathroom cabinets.

name: Wood Glue
description: Professional-grade wood adhesive that creates strong, permanent bonds. Water-resistant formula ideal for interior and exterior woodworking projects.
